name: Photography School
description1: Build a web application with separate admin sections for students, instructors, and administrators, including e-commerce functionality
description2: User-friendly interface, dynamic UI with React, real-time data sync with Firebase and MongoDB, backend logic with Express.js and Node.js, e-commerce capabilities.
description3: Design admin sections for different roles, integrate Firebase and MongoDB for data storage, use HTML Tailwind CSS, and React for frontend, implement Express.js and Node.js for backend logic, and enable e-commerce functionality

name: Toy Cars
description1: Create a simple web app for a toy cars store using HTML, Tailwind CSS, React, Express, Firebase, and Node.js.
description2: Key Features: User-friendly interface, toy car catalog display, shopping cart functionality with Firebase, server-side logic with Express and Node.js.
description3: Develop frontend using HTML, Tailwind CSS, and React; integrate Firebase for data storage; implement Express and Node.js for server-side logic and API handling; test thoroughly and deploy the app for users to access.

name: Chief Recipes
description1: Develop a simple web app called Cookiteers using HTML, Tailwind CSS, React, Express, Firebase, and Node.js for recipe sharing.
description2: User-friendly interface, user accounts, recipe sharing, search functionality, Firebase for data storage, Express and Node.js for server-side logic.
description3: Design frontend with HTML, Tailwind CSS, and React; utilize Firebase for data storage; implement Express and Node.js for server-side logic; thoroughly test and deploy the app.
